task:
Login to Twitter and browse timeline:
1. Use navigate action to go to https://twitter.com/i/flow/login
2. Wait 3 seconds for login page to load
3. Fill in the username or email field with {email} from sensitive_data
4. Click Next button
5. Wait 2 seconds
6. Fill in the password field with {password} from sensitive_data
7. Click Log in button
8. Wait 5 seconds for the home timeline to load
9. Scroll down to load more tweets
10. Wait 2 seconds
11. Click on your profile icon in the left sidebar
12. Wait 3 seconds for profile page to load
13. Scroll down to see more tweets and profile sections
14. Wait 2 seconds
15. Use done action to complete
